description:
Cool, comfy coverage that lets you forget about your clothes and focus on the trail. Made from a breathable and durable material, the Compound jersey keeps the air flowing and can brush off those inevitable bails.

  • Omega 100p knit is 100% polyester, so it dries quickly and breathes well
  • Stretchy nylon blend panels move with you and wick away moisture
  • Reinforced shoulders and chest work well under pack straps
  • Patterned to fit like your favourite tee off bike and stay out of the way when you’re in the saddle
  • Drop-tail hem adds extra coverage from trail spray
  • UPF 40+ protection, blocking more than 97% of harsh UV
  • 7mesh has a crash replacement program, so if you damage your gear within the first 30 days of purchase, 7mesh will (at their discretion) repair or replace your item. They can even help you keep your old gear going, helping to repair crashed apparel, charging only a small fee to cover the service
name: 7mesh Compound  Long Sleeve Shirt - Men's
